item.title: jQuery Mobile version of my video game listing
item.description:
I picked up an electronic copy of jQuery Mobile by Jon Reid a little while ago and have been slowly making my way through it.

I've finally gotten to the point where I wanted to try creating a jQuery Mobile version of my video game listing.

View the jQuery Mobile version of my video games listing.

In addition to jQuery Mobile, this also uses oXygen XML Editor, for taking the original XML source and transforming it via an XSLT 2.0 solution to generate the HTML.
